full_text:
2015 ዓም ህዝባችን የናፈቀውን ሰላምና እፎይታ የሚያገኝበት፤
በጦርነት፣ በመፈናቀልና በኑሮ ውድነት ከደረሰበት መጎሳቆል እና እንግልት የሚያገግምበት፣ እርስ በርስ ከሚያናቁረው ፖለቲካ ተላቆ የፍቅርና የመተሳሰብ አዲስ ዘመን እንዲሆንለት እመኛለሁ

full_text: RT @_HornAfrica: The Comprehensive Framework Agreement (CFA)  codifies a vision of equitable and reasonable utilization of the Nile waters…

legacy.description: Horn Africa Insight is a web outlet  researching Ethiopia and the greater impact on the Horn of Africa.
legacy.name: Horn Africa Insight

legacy.full_text:
The Comprehensive Framework Agreement (CFA)  codifies a vision of equitable and reasonable utilization of the Nile waters without causing significant harm among the riparian countries , writes Stephen Max Donkor(Ph.D).
https://t.co/GlOvIjbWbS
